code: import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import AddressLink from"../AddressLink";import PlaceGallery from"../PlaceGallery";import BookingDates from"../BookingDates";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BookingPage(){const{id}=useParams();const[booking,setBooking]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(id){axios.get('/bookings').then(response=>{const foundBooking=response.data.find(_ref=>{let{_id}=_ref;return _id===id;});if(foundBooking){setBooking(foundBooking);}});}},[id]);if(!booking){return'';}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl",children:booking.place.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddressLink,{className:"my-2 block",children:booking.place.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-200 p-6 my-6 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl mb-4",children:"Your booking information:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookingDates,{booking:booking})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-primary p-6 text-white rounded-2xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Total price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-3xl",children:["\u20B9",booking.price," "]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlaceGallery,{place:booking.place})]});}
